name: run C
short_description:
this is a small tool that uses C and simple shell scripting to execute C program
in linux based systems without any good IDE. Mainly made for my little brother
who is 12 now. Sometimes it is necessary to do experiment with old linux distro.
But the software centers are backdated and upgrade is needed to get an IDE, or
3rd party installation is problematic. So this tool can be used and we don't need
to write the compiling command "gcc -o ..." again and again in terminal. only use
any text editor to code C language and build+run in another window.

*NB: only for console based applications.
